lead_paragraph: As Egypt's Doaa Elghobashy went up for a block on Italy's Laura Giombini on Copacabana's famous sand, two cultures appeared to come together.

headline.print_headline: Beach Volleyball: Egypt's Player in Hijab Gets Brazilian Support
headline.main: Beach Volleyball: Egypt's Player in Hijab Gets Brazilian Support

snippet: As Egypt's Doaa Elghobashy went up for a block on Italy's Laura Giombini on Copacabana's famous sand, two cultures appeared to come together....
